briefTitle: Metabolic Analysis for Treatment Choice in Gestational Diabetes Mellitus
officialTitle: Metabolic Analysis for Treatment Choice in Gestational Diabetes Mellitus

protocolDocument.label: Study Protocol and Statistical Analysis Plan

eligibilityCriteria.criteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Pregnant women beyond 24 weeks of gestation who are scheduled for a 3-hour oral glucose tolerance test.

Exclusion Criteria:

* Fetal anomaly
* Pregestational diabetes
* GDM diagnosis without a 3-hour OGTT
* Multifetal gestation
* Treatment with non-inhaled steroids within 7 days
* Allergy to glyburide, metformin or sulfa
* History of severe pulmonary (pulmonary requirement for oxygen therapy or daily treatment for restrictive of obstructive pulmonary disease)
* Hepatic (LFT's greater than two times of upper normal range)
* Renal (serum creatinine higher than 1.2 mg/dL) disease
* History of heart failure or myocardial infarction

primary.measure: Proportion of Women Who Are Eligible, Screened, Enroll and Remain in the Study
primary.description: Proportion of women who are eligible, screened, enrolled and remain in the study
primary.timeFrame: Through study completion, an average of 16 weeks

primary.measure: Proportion of Participants Who Report Suitability of the Study Procedures
primary.description: Suitability of the study procedures and interventions to participants assessed through one-on-one qualitative interview
primary.timeFrame: Through study completion, an average of 16 weeks

secondary.measure: Proportion of Participants With Consistent GDM Mechanism Before and and After Treatment Initiation
Proportion of Women Who Remain on Same Treatment During Study
secondary.timeFrame: Through study completion, an average of 16 weeks

secondary.description: \>50% fasting below 95 and 1 hour postprandial \< 140 during the 4 weeks before delivery

secondary.measure: Proportion of Participants Who Deliver by Primary Cesarean
Proportion of Participants Who Developed Hypertensive Diseases in Pregnancy
